definitions.definition: To deform in such a manner that part of the rod or bolt is displaced sideways , offset from the longitudinal axis of the part, but remains parallel with the part's main longitudinal axis, with the final shape somewhat resembling a crankshaft .
labels: of a straight bolt or rod
definitions.label_groups: of a straight bolt or rod

main_definition: ( of a straight bolt or rod ) To deform in such a manner that part of the rod or bolt is displaced sideways , offset from the longitudinal axis of the part, but remains parallel with the part's main longitudinal axis, with the final shape somewhat resembling a crankshaft .
